Oh, there’s tonnes of terrific stuff—I’ll go with you!
Ahh!
Look at you two, bonding, making us late for the airport so…

Oh, he’s fine. He’s fine. It’s just that us getting along
is difficult for him, because he doesn’t like me.
Oh come on! That’s-that’s… true.
Hi!
Hey!
Hey! Do we have a baby name yet?

Well, it certainly worked for that Valdez kid.
Ooh-ooh, Pheebs, you want a strong name? How about, The Hulk?

Oh, want a good name, go with Joey. Joey’s your pal. Joey’s your

Joey."

Hey, y’know what, if you’re gonna do that, if you’re

Oh well, hey, Joey’s loveable too! But the thing about Joey is, if

Well, Chandler will be there for you too. I mean, well, he might be a

What do ya say? What do ya say?

Well, I, I like the idea of naming him after someone I love, and Joey
and Chandler are great names. (They both stare at her.) But, all right, I
don’t—maybe I’ll just name him The Hulk.

I knew I shouldn’t have mentioned it! That’s what I wanted to
name my kid!

Hey!
Hey!
So uh, Emily called last night…

This is so nice. Thank you for doing this.

Oh I know, my God, this is so—this rice is so—I am so good.

Maybe.

All right, so, what are we supposed to call you?
Okay uh, for now, temporarily, you can call me, Clint.
No way are you cool enough to pull of Clint.

Umm, Gene.

Okay!

Okay!
